behavior locate_remote_control(remote_control:item):
    body:
        achieve visited(remote_control)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control)
        if not visited(remote_control):
            observe(remote_control, "Check the location of the remote control")
        locate_remote_control(remote_control)

Goal Representation:
def has_plugged_in(x:item):
    symbol plugged_in = exists y: item : is_powersocket(y) and close(x, y)
    return plugged_in

behavior ensure_tv_in_view(tv:item):
    body:
        observe(tv, "Check if the TV is in view")

behavior ensure_tv_has_power(tv:item):
    body:
        if not plugged(tv):
            bind plug: item where:
                is_powersocket(plug) and close(tv, plug)
            achieve plugged(tv)
        achieve is_off(tv)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind tv: item where:
            is_television(tv)
        ensure_tv_in_view(tv)
        if not has_plugged_in(tv):
            ensure_tv_has_power(tv)
